name: Inazuma Eleven Go 2: Chrono Stone - Neppuu
name_original: Inazuma Eleven Go 2: Chrono Stone - Neppuu
description:
Inazuma Eleven Go 2: Chrono Stone - Neppuu is a sports-arcade game developed by Level 5. It was originally released in 2012. Nintendo published the game.
Inazuma Eleven Go 2: Chrono Stone - Neppuu is available on Nintendo 3DS.
